content: i love learning new stitches and i ve been eyeing the basketweave crochet stitch for a while dishcloths are such a fun way to learn new stitches i love having a collection of dishcloths for wiping baby and toddler hands after meals this is the latest addition to that collection even though this is simply a dishcloth i do recommend blocking your work because this squishy stitch really warps the fabric in the blog post you can see before and after pictures of the dishcloth with and without blocking i hope you enjoy this pattern a fun stitch with beautiful texture
